alfredsnippet.snippet:
"SR [Special Relativity] has been confirmed by experiment so many times that it borders on crackpot to say there is something wrong with it. Experiments have been done to test SR explicitly. The world's particle accelerators would not work if SR wasn't in effect. The global positioning system would not work if special relativity didn't work the way we thought it did."

- Clifford Will, Washington University
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - An Example of the Common Claim that Special Relativity Has Been Proven
